item.title: Introduction to Spanish
item.description: Welcome to the ESP Spanish Wiki! Here’s some essential knowledge to kick-start your Spanish learning journey! The first lesson is fairly long, so feel free to take breaks in between. Gender Spanish nouns have gender. Usually, nouns ending in -o are masculine, like nacho, and words ending in -a are feminine like agua. This is a general pattern and you will see many exceptions to it. Other patterns will emerge as you learn more Spanish.
